easy.q: I have four legs and a back, I help you sit. What am I?
easy.hint: You use me at a desk.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be.
medium.hint: Think about adding letters to change meaning.

hard.q: A box has no hinges, yet it can be opened. Inside lies a secret that changes with time. What is it?
hard.hint: It marks days and hours, but isn't a clock.
